title: What is the worst iMac to buy in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: To be honest I can’t find fault with any of the 2020 lap or desk top computers the butterfly keyboard was eliminated the MacBook Air specs are now respectable for the base model the 16″ Mac Book pro is a powerhouse and the latest I Mac 27″ 2020 is in some areas better than 27″ I Mac Pro I give a thumbs up to all the Apple computers

The worst iMac to buy in 2020? The iMac G5. Older versions were aesthetically interesting enough to keep one around for the looks if you have the space. Newer ones are more useful in the present day. The G5 falls through the space between.
